seen_by.content: We've heard a great deal of interest from many of you about the newly launched Tableau Prep software. So... the team has acted to arrange for a product showcase with Tableau on 22nd June from 10am to 12pm at SP! Join us on this session to see Tableau Prep live in action :) Sign up here: https://dsd_tableauprepbrief.eventbrite.sg
